div.div:
Alex - December 15, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 1.1.0
Fixed all my GPS fix issues! Worth every penny!
Usually took my GPS up to 10 minutes to get a useable fix.Now when that happens I minimize navigator, hit GPS doctor and seconds later all works!

Robert - April 22, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1.0
Wow awesome (galaxy s2 epic touch)
I've tried every GPS app to fix my phone and this is a miracle app. Well worth the price. Easy app to use and fixed my GPS in under a minute!!!!

martoonman - May 7, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1.0
Fantastic! (Galaxy S2)
My GPS took forever to obtain a fix, and now it's a matter of seconds. Can't recommend it enough. Works great with CoPilot which I have found to be the best GPS program available. Both programs deserve 5 stars.

dlorde - August 2, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 1.1.0
After 18 months, GPS on my HTC Desire slowly stopped working. This app fixed ...
After 18 months, GPS on my HTC Desire slowly stopped working. This app fixed it in seconds. Great!

Brian - January 21, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Awesome galaxy s I500
I have tried to fix the gps on this phone since I've had it for more than a year. This is the only thing that fixed the problem. Excellent job. Samsung galaxy s I500.

Binx - June 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
It works perfect
Ficking hell omg this is well worth it my gps takes ages to locate me on my galaxy s i use sygic and nav free run the app it takes a couple of secs for the gps to find me best gps fix ever workd perfect finds u instansly brill thank you gps doctor u have sorted my gps issues out ten out of ten

kappel - April 12, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Worse than nothing at all!
All I wanted was to get quicker GPS fixes, as I was already getting accurate ones. After installing this, it took forever to get a fix that was way way way off. I don't know when they start the 15 minute clock to get an uninstall and refund option, but by the time it finished trying to find me, the refund option was no longer available. This is the first time I got burned with an app that didn't work and not able to get a refund. I'm using a Samsung Epic 4G.

Kerry Summers - March 11, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1.0
OMG
Thank you thank you thank you! I've seen lots of people having issues with GPS on Epic Touch. I wiped several times, and even installed a new ROM and nothing! After literally 45 seconds, my GPS finally works!

Stephen - August 20, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 1.1.0
wow this
works too good lol used it only once and my navigation is fixed. Worth it though. Sensation 4G.

Jay - March 28, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 1.1.0
Works great! Well worth the money to have usable gps again.

Leo - October 30, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Docomo Galaxy S owner. This app works!!! GPS had problem connecting but after using ...
Docomo Galaxy S owner. This app works!!! GPS had problem connecting but after using this, my phone's GPS works flawlessley. Money well spent!

John - March 22, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 1.1.0
Didn't work for my Droid Incredible.

Dave - June 17, 2012 - Version 1.1.0
Samsung SGH-T959W
Worked great as soon as I was in a position with a clear view of the sky and 3G coverage. Went from not seeing any satellites to finding 17 in 2 seconds.

Ross - March 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1.0
Easy to use
Sorry i.gave a bad review when it was my phone that was the problem its all now fixed and gps doc works like a dream

Phil - June 2, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
This is a great little application
A few months ago the GPS on my Galaxy S stopped working consistently. Then it completely stopped working. This little app fixed the problem in a couple of minutes. Well worth the $2!

Scott - November 7, 2011 - Kyocera Echo with version 1.1.0
awesome work guys
normally my gps on my sanyo echo wasnt accurate...kept deciding to put me a mile from my actual location or then jumping 90miles from actual.now works

Zarco - June 9, 2011 - Version 1.1.0
Scratch that it's just endlessly, blinkin there...it's about the same. Still not ...
Scratch that it's just endlessly, blinkin there...it's about the same. Still not picking up gps in maps or navigation

kucke - March 4, 2011 - Motorola Droid with version 1.1.0
great!
gps finally works on my galaxy s

Evan - December 31, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Finally
Was searching for an app that solved a gps issue at home. Was picking up a satellite 25 miles away. GPS Dr fixed my problem!

mac - September 27, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Holy crap it worked!
My vibrant wouldn't work before, this is the only thing that could fix it!

ChErWilco - April 20, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Should be free as long as developer is still experimenting with his software on ...
Should be free as long as developer is still experimenting with his software on our phones! Samsung galaxy s (vibrant) hard locked after quick fix

Richard - June 27, 2011 - Motorola Atrix with version 1.1.0
This App fixed my gps non-lock/failure in just seconds. Saved me trying to file ...
This App fixed my gps non-lock/failure in just seconds. Saved me trying to file a warranty claim. Motorola/AT&T Atrix "4G".

Viktor L. - August 20, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Mini with version 1.1.0
Used together with FasterFix (sets nearest ntp server) and a phone reboot, they ...
Used together with FasterFix (sets nearest ntp server) and a phone reboot, they solved my problem. I got my first gps fix in 9 secs :-)

harold - September 30, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
This bs did even load to my phone an I can't get a refund ...
This bs did even load to my phone an I can't get a refund I dont even have a icon on my screan for. This is a scam! ! ! Don't buy! !!

Teresa - November 10, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.1.0
Worked for Verizon DROID X
It worked for me after trying everything I wish I should of started here! Well 2 bucks spent. I definitely recommend it.

Natalie - September 2, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 1.1.0
disappointed
It didn't fix anything. Still no navigation. No gps. Nothing!

Bryan - April 25, 2012 - Version 1.1.0
Bryan
works well a good fixer, thanks

Me - September 9, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 1.1.0
Thunderbolt
I had no GPS running rooted Thunderbolt with Cyanogenmod 7.1.0 RC1. THIS FIXED THE ISSUE IN 30 SECONDS AND GPS RUNS ALOT FASTER!!!

Abdul - March 20, 2012 - Version 1.1.0
Vibrant-CM7101
Awesome! I recently flashed my Vibrant w/CM 7.1.0.1 and my GPS did not work. Now it’s working thanks guys :) !

Quica - March 5, 2011 - Version 1.1.0
Does what it says.
Getting locks much faster now. Accuracy is a little better while in motion too.

Robert - April 11, 2011 - Motorola Droid II with version 1.1.0
Droid 2, gps hasn't worked in 2 days, installed GPS Doctor, working perfectly again ...
Droid 2, gps hasn't worked in 2 days, installed GPS Doctor, working perfectly again in about a minute and a half! SWEET!

Augusto - April 14, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Bad
Didn't work at all for my captivate 2.3

Hodan - September 6, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Nope
Didn't work at all for my Vibrant still no GPS. Flushed $1 down the drain.

September 9, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
I have an galaxy s and it immediately fix my gps...worth the pay

Peter - September 25, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Perfectly Quickfixed my Galaxy S

Worked for me.
Droid x. Fixed my gps no fix problem.

Didn't work

Wouldn't do anything. Every time I tried to open it my phone would freeze ...
Wouldn't do anything. Every time I tried to open it my phone would freeze for about 2 minutes then it would force close. Refunded. [Droid X - Verizon]

Grindstone - June 8, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
The app downloaded [this time], but it didn't fix anything. Samsung Captivate 2.2

Patricie - April 11, 2012 - HTC Desire S with version 1.1.0
Great help!
Fixed my GPS, that was not able to fix the location!

Android - March 18, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1.0
It worked!!!
Im using ics leak and it has a gps bug. This app fixed it. Totally worth the two bucks! Thanks

Arturo - June 6, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Worked great on my captivate..corrected the cache and allowed google apps to run ...
Worked great on my captivate..corrected the cache and allowed google apps to run faster

Ian - December 5, 2011 - Version 1.1.0
Awesome
Fixed my samsung captivate s.

Omar - May 8, 2012 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 1.1.0
Excelent!!
Very nice app work as expected

pejman - January 2, 2012 - Samsung Nexus S with version 1.1.0
Great app.
You are the man. It works perfectly on nexus s. Thanks

Boaz - October 10, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Samsung galaxy s
Works really well

Mark - March 19, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1.0
E4GT
Fixed me in seconds after having problems when I flashed a leaked ICS ROM. Many thanks!

Tovi - June 4, 2011 - Version 1.1.0
Gps fixed! No thanks to samsung... Captivate.

Evan - April 7, 2012 - Motorola Droid X with version 1.1.0
Magic.
Fixed my droid X gps problems instantly.

udm196 - December 14, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 1.1.0
Misses 5stars due to missing widget and scheduling

Jamie - March 3, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Doesn't work..galaxy s

Daniel - December 1, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Fixed my Samsung Galaxy S
On my Galaxy S, time to lock onto gps signal went down from 15+ seconds to almost instant. Location accuracy is also much better. Amazing!

steven - November 29, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 1.1.0
Rubbish
Meant to be 0 stars,not 5

c - June 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S
It Does nothing
App promises to fix GPS problems, but now my Samsung Vibrant is worse than before and will not get a GPS fix. Waste of 2 dollars and my time.

Ádám - March 3, 2012 - HTC Desire S
Great!!!!!!!
Works great on my HTC Desire S Fixed my GPS yeaaaahh :) Nagyon király, 6 másodperc alatt lefutott, utána a panelházból kihajolva az ablakon azonnal volt GPS jel :)) Két dollárt lazán megér :)

Don - December 30, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S
Seems like a great app, but did not fix my GPS at all. Samsung ...
Seems like a great app, but did not fix my GPS at all. Samsung Captivate/Galaxy S

David - December 18, 2011 - HTC Desire
Crashes Cyanogenmod 7
Crashes Cyanogenmod 7 on HTC Desire cdma every time I try to use it.

Victor - June 30, 2012 - LG myTouch E739
Good
Goodq

Chuck - April 24, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2
Didn't work. Waste of money.
This program is a waste of money. It doesn't work or do anything the free programs don't do. Didn't fix GPS on Epic 4G Touch. Emailed developer 2x asking for a refund and got no response.
